de.dfki.lt.mary.htsengine
Class HTSModelSet

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.lt.mary.htsengine.HTSModelSet

public class HTSModelSet
extends java.lang.Object

Set of all HMM pdfs models for duration, log f0, mel-cepstrum, bandpass voicing strengths and Fourier magnitudes (the signal processing part of Fourier magnitudes is not implemented yet). This function also implements functions for searching particular pdfs in the model set. Java port and extension of HTS engine version 2.0 Extension: mixed excitation

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan

loadModelSet

public void loadModelSet(HMMData htsData)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
This function loads the models set contained in files .pdf, it uses as input the names of the files .pdf, these file names are in HMMData. DUR, LF0 and MCP are required as minimum for generating voice, STR and MAG are optional for generating mixed excitation.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
